column1: # Chars to replace, first column is for illustration only
# spaces, underscore, tab change to U+0020

201F	0022	8223 double high-reversed-9 quotation mark

‹	2039	0022	8249 single left-pointing angle quotation mark
›	203A	0022	8250 single right-pointing angle quotation mark

⹂	2E42	0022	11842 	double low-reversed-9 quotation mark


# ASCII
# $	0024	0020	# keep?
# %	0025	0020	# keep?
&	0026	0020
(	0028	0020
)	0029	0020

#:	003A	0020	58 Colon
;	003B	002C	59 Semicolon -> Comma (or Full Stop 2E)
<	003C	0020
>	003E	0020
^	005E	0020

=	003D	0020
*	002A	0020
+	002B	0020

@	0040	0020
[	005B	0020
]	005D	0020
^	005E	0020	94 Circumflex Accent
{	007B	0020
}	007D	0020
/	002F	0020	47 solidus
\	005C	0020	92 reverse solidus
|	007C	0020	124 vertical line
~	007E	0020	126 tilde

# other
ѣ	0463	0435	ять -> е Cyrillic Small Letter Yat
Ѳ	0473	0424	1139 фита Cyrillic Small Letter Fita
...	2026	002E	8230 horizontal ellipsis (многоточие) # keep?
•	2022	0020	8226 bullet
#́	0301	0000	769 Combining Acute Accent бо́льшую (remove)
